description.value:
You adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty. Choose one of the following options from the appropriate class list. You can't take a Fighting Style option more than once, even if you later get to choose again.

@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class-features.CpfNyQr152vGca7F]{Fighting Style: Archery}

@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class-features.IGl43IcDDLC7rJOs]{Fighting Style: Defense}

@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class-features.9WjjcbJ42RyG8fw1]{Fighting Style: Single Weapon Fighting}

@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class-features.ipFfwmfAjjuNXaru]{Fighting Style: Two-Weapon Fighting}

@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class-features.hx1F2DRLVa1bfCzz]{Fighting Style: Protection}

Click@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.VLxJ80DY7q7hkXU7.JournalEntryPage.QjLATbZ1uI3tAwjs#fighting-styles]{here} for a detailed overview of changes.
